Mechanics

Right click: Every single object can be right clicked to see what different options can be activated. By default, there are 3: Walk towards, examine and cancel the options menu. Examine gives a short description about the object.

Dialogue: I implemented a dialogue system that can have multiple endings, infinite loops, multiple choices and multiple set of choices.

Movement: The movement is driven by a point and click to move. Unity's Nav Mesh was used to implement the path finding system. 

Menu: Choices for the settings are on world space using city props.

Tutorial: Short three step tutorial: Camera rotation, movement and right clicking.
